alert.note: Alert for Niobrara (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 3:21PM MDT until June 29 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Niobrara County in east central Wyoming... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 320 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lusk, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lusk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern and east central Wyoming. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern and east central Wyoming.
